subSubSection.paragraph:
Type host:
Sterna hirundo hirundo Linnaeus, 1758
.

Chilean hosts:
Sterna hirundo Linnaeus, 1758
;
Sterna hirundinacea Lesson, 1831
.

Other hosts:
Sterna bergii Lichtenstein, 1823
;
Sterna bengalensis Lesson, 1831
.
Sterna striata Gmelin, 1789
;
Sterna vittata bethunei Buller, 1896
.

Chilean references:
González-Acuña et al . (2006a)
; this catalogue.

Remarks: Magallanes is a new locality record for
Quadraceps sellatus sellatus
in Chile , based on a sample from
Sterna hirundinacea
held in NHML (
Shchedrina et al . 2017
). In agreement with Palma (2017: 183) and contrary to
Price et al . (2003: 227)
, we regard this louse taxon as a subspecies.

Rallicola Johnston & Harrison, 1911
.
Proc. Linn. Soc. New South Wales
36 (2), 324. Type species:
Oncophorus attenuatus
N. [sic] =
Rallicola ( Rallicola ) ortygometrae ( Schrank, 1781 )
(by original designation).

Furnaricola Carriker, 1944b
. Bol. Ent. Venezol. 3 (2), 83. Type species:
Furnaricola acutifrons Carriker, 1944b
=
Rallicola ( Rallicola ) acutifrons (Carriker, 1944)
(by original designation).
